overview:
Personalized Baby Gifts, Baby Shower Gifts

Find luxury baby gifts, baby blankets, baby shower gifts, personalized baby gifts & other special gifts such as baby baskets, baby boy gifts and baby girl gifts at Elegant Child of Beverly Hills.

Company Overview:

Established in 1989, The Elegant Child of Beverly Hills offers an array of personalized baby gifts including specialty products, luxury items, baby boy gifts and custom gift baskets for very special newborns. These exquisite gifts display the style, sophistication and quality that is the essence of The Elegant Child. The Elegant Child of Beverly Hills’ appointment-only showroom has the most irresistible and classic gifts that are tailor-made and sure to please even the most discerning recipients. Their incredible service and quality is not limited to local clientele. The Elegant Child is accessible worldwide via website and telephone where they offer great attention to detail and personalization.

The Elegant Child’s beautifully designed website features 400 plus pages of information, is well-organized and a joy to use. Included in the coveted City Baby L.A. and Purple Book, the source for the best online shopping on the web, The Elegant Child of Beverly Hills’ website allows customers to shop from their home or office for the most distinctive and treasured baby gifts around.

CONTACT INFORMATION
